user.title: Carroll Electric Account
user.description:
Enter your Carroll Electric account details.

Your account number must be provided instead of a username as the usage API requires it as an input.

The URL of a Selenium server is required to automate interactions with the Carroll Electric website.

abort.already_configured: This Carroll Electric account is already integrated.

error.invalid_account_number: Account Number must be digits of the form: XXXXXX-XXX
error.invalid_selenium_url: Selenium server URL is not a valid URL
